metadata.title: CVE-2013-2228 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
SaltStack RSA Key Generation allows remote users to decrypt communications

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2228` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

salt-common - 0.15.1-1
salt-master - 0.15.1-1
salt-minion - 0.15.1-1
salt-syndic - 0.15.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: salt package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.15.1-1').
